Name: Crux: The Great Outdoors
About the game: Crux: The Great Outdoors is a rock climbing game in which you move your climberâ€™s hands and feet from hold to hold - but each hold will only let you hang on for so long. Unique time-based puzzle mechanic: Change your body position by moving hands or feet to a new hold - the hand hold determines how much time you have to move before falling off. Plan ahead and execute: You'll need to think ahead and execute flawlessly to beat all levels in the least amount of moves. Enjoy the Great Outdoors: Solve over 70 climbing challenges in nine peaceful and beautiful landscapes, from Caribbean coastline to rugged Highlands and red canyon walls.
